name: Blooming Blaster
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 46
A simple game about a gun that is also a plant.

Make sure to stay in the sunbeam as often as you can, and pick up water to keep your gun healthy. if you don’t it’ll explode, and you’ll die. that’s probably bad.

Controls: WASD for movement Mouse aims Left mouse button shoots. (be aware shooting the gun uses water too :) )

music by MusMus:
http://musmus.main.jp/english.html

(if you're having issues with performance in your browser, try downloading it. It seems like it's fine now but I was noticing some hiccups when the game was first uploaded)
